description: PSPC, on behalf of Transport Canada, has a requirement for design services for the MV Confederation berth bollard replacement at the Caribou Ferry Terminal in Nova Scotia.

**Electronic Tender Notification**

**Title:** EB144-250310 - MV Confederation Berth Bollard Replacement Design
**Official Titles:** MV Confederation Berth Bollard Replacement Design (English) / Conception des nouveaux bollards du poste d'amarrage du NM Confederation (French)

**Reference Number:** WS4635674257-Doc4639461053

**Tender Details:**

* **Publication Date:** June 17, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 3, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 17, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** July 31, 2025

**Procurement Information:**

* **Supply Arrangement:** EB129-192368 Heavy Civil – Marine Engineering Services
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Project Description:** The Department of Transport (TC) requires design services for the MV Confederation berth bollard replacement at the Caribou Ferry Terminal in Nova Scotia. Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Invited Firms:**

* Dillon Consulting
* Eastern Designers
* Eastpoint Engineering Ltd
* EXP Services Inc
* GEMTEC
* Harbourside Engineering Consultants
* Hatch Ltd
* Pinto Engineering Ltd
* SHM Canada Consulting Ltd
* Stantec Consulting
* WSP Canada Inc.

**Debrief:** Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

**Contact Information:**

* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Nicole Fesseha, Phone: Not Available, Email: nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
